title: SYMHC Classics: Esther Cox and the Great Amherst Mystery
itunes:title: SYMHC Classics: Esther Cox and the Great Amherst Mystery
description:
This 2017 episode examines how, after a traumatic event, strange things began happening around Esther Cox. In the 1870s, Amherst, Nova Scotia was abuzz with theories as to whether the phenomena were the work of a poltergeist, strange electrical charges, or a hoax.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
